creators.name: Younis, Almotasem Bellah
creators.affiliation: Division of Microbial Ecology (DOME), Centre for Microbiology and Environmental Systems Science (CeMESS), University of Vienna

title: Single-Cell Biofilm Heterogeneity Pilot
description: Reanalysis of bacterial single-cell RNA-seq data (GSE231935, M3-Seq) demonstrating transcriptional heterogeneity in E. coli populations. Pipeline: load, QC, normalize, PCA/UMAP, clustering, differential expression. Findings support future work on biofilm regulation and MGE-host interactions.
